Creator: Amielle El Makhzoumi
Description:
!image-20260130-001421.png|width=519,alt="image-20260130-001421.png"!

Application version 1.1

Function Tested : “Would you like to do another transaction?”

The initial state of the system : system asking for if user wants to continue to make another transaction

Details to reproduce the defect ; insert card, enter valid card number, enter valid pin, select any transaction type, perform it fully

The expected outcome ;  System should display “Would you like to do another transaction?”

The actual outcome ;  System displays “Wood you like to do another transaction?”, with a spelling mistake on the word “Wood/Would”



RESOLVED IN V1.1

Creator: Amielle El Makhzoumi
Description:
Application version 1.1

Function Tested : Card number verification 
The initial state of the system : system asking valid credit card number in idle

Details to reproduce the defect ; insert card, enter random card number

The expected outcome ;  System should automatically eject an invalid card 

The actual outcome ;  System automatically asks for pin entry despite having uninitialized card details 

!Screenshot 2026-01-26 at 2.27.52 AM.png|width=833,alt="Screenshot 2026-01-26 at 2.27.52 AM.png"!

Creator: Amielle El Makhzoumi
Description:
Application version 1.1

Function Tested : Account Transfers 
The initial state of the system : system asking for transfer amount in idle

Details to reproduce the defect ; insert card, enter valid card number, enter valid pin, select (3) (transfers), select from (1) (checking), select to (2) savings, select 20$ for the amount, click enter 

The expected outcome ;  System should display a balance increase of 20$ to desired account 

The actual outcome ;  System displays an account balance increase of 19.50$

!Screenshot 2026-01-26 at 2.19.54 AM.png|width=833,alt="Screenshot 2026-01-26 at 2.19.54 AM.png"!

RESOLVED IN V1.1

Creator: Amielle El Makhzoumi
Description:
Application version 1.1

Function Tested : Withdrawing money from account
The initial state of the system :  Main page, idle waiting for input 

Details to reproduce the defect ; Turn on system, enter a card, enter valid card number, enter valid pin, select withdraw (1), 
select an amount.

The expected outcome ;  System should display a receipts stating a account balance decrease of the amount selected above and withdraw amount should equal money received

The actual outcome ;  System displays a correct account balance but the amount withdrawn is 20$ over expected value. RESOLVED

!Screenshot 2026-01-26 at 9.04.31 AM.png|width=776,alt="Screenshot 2026-01-26 at 9.04.31 AM.png"!

Description:

Creator: Josral Frederick
Description:
Application version 1.0

Function Tested : Withdrawing money from account
The initial state of the system :  Main page, idle waiting for input 

Details to reproduce the defect ; Turn on system, enter a card, enter valid card number, enter valid pin, select withdraw (1), 
select an amount.

The expected outcome ;  System should display a receipts stating a account balance decrease of the amount selected above and withdraw amount should equal money received

The actual outcome ;  System displays a correct account balance but the amount withdrawn is 20$ over expected value.

Creator: Josral Frederick
Description:
Application version 1.1

Function Tested : Deposit Amount
The initial state of the system : system asking for deposit amount

Details to reproduce the defect ; insert card, enter valid card number, enter valid pin, select (2) (deposit), select (1) (checking), select a deposit amount ie: any number greater than 10 digits 

The expected outcome ;  System should display a receipts stating a account balance increased by the amount entered 

The actual outcome ;  System crash and unresponsive, user cannot back out (get their money back) 



!Screenshot 2026-01-26 at 4.38.43 AM.png|width=633,alt="Screenshot 2026-01-26 at 4.38.43 AM.png"!



[https://www.loom.com/share/46fe690942954a289d7ac93ba95b5f36|https://www.loom.com/share/46fe690942954a289d7ac93ba95b5f36|smart-embed]

Creator: Josral Frederick
Description:
Application version 1.1

Defect still exists in version 1.1


The initial state of the system : system asking for deposit amount

Details to reproduce the defect ; insert card, enter valid card number, enter valid pin, select (2) (deposit), select (1) (checking), select 50$ for the amount, Click to insert envelope

The expected outcome ;  System should display a receipts stating a account balance increase of 50$

The actual outcome ;  System displays an account balance increase of 49.90$ and an available balance of 60$

!Screenshot 2026-01-26 at 4.20.10 AM.png|width=313,alt="Screenshot 2026-01-26 at 4.20.10 AM.png"!

Creator: Josral Frederick
Description:
Application version 1.1

Function Tested : Pin insertion
The initial state of the system : system is on and idle

Details to reproduce the defect ; insert card, enter correct card number , enter a pin with digits exceeding 4. 

The expected outcome ;  System should disallow user from entering numbers greater than 4 digits 

The actual outcome ;  System allows for pin of up to 22 digits long 

!Screenshot 2026-01-26 at 4.08.13 AM.png|width=313,alt="Screenshot 2026-01-26 at 4.08.13 AM.png"!

Creator: Josral Frederick
Description:
Application version 1.1

Function Tested : Pin insertion
The initial state of the system : system is on and idle

Details to reproduce the defect ; insert card, enter random card number , enter a random long pin (ie 11 or more digits) 

The expected outcome ;  System should disallow user from entering numbers greater than 4 digits 

The actual outcome ;  System crashes, user can not back out. 

!Screenshot 2026-01-26 at 4.08.27 AM.png|width=770,alt="Screenshot 2026-01-26 at 4.08.27 AM.png"!
